meanings.sent1: The heptarch gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: The heptarch worked together to lead the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The heptarch's meeting turned into a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: The heptarch stood united like a mighty oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The heptarch's power was undeniable and respected by all.

meanings.definition: A political system with seven rulers
meanings.sent1: The heptarchic system ensured balanced governance.
meanings.sent2: The heptarch was a unique form of ruling in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The heptarch's election process was quite complex.
meanings.sent4: The heptarchic structure resembled a harmonious puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The heptarch's rule brought stability and order to the land.

meanings.sent1: The heptarch of the week passed by quickly.
meanings.sent2: The heptarch of time marked the completion of a cycle.
meanings.sent3: The heptarch felt shorter due to the holiday season.
meanings.sent4: The heptarch of the calendar brought new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The heptarch of days was filled with joy and laughter.
